void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodHemizygousParentOfOrigin::run (  )  [virtual]

Run the analysis.

Hemizygous is when the index inherets only one allele from only parent. (CN=1 + genotype concordance with one parent)

Implements CNFamilialAnalysisMethod.
